document_data.name: Empyrean Knights
document_data.mainbody: The '''Empyrean Knights''' were an armed force protecting [[Stardeep]], drawn from the ranks of the [[star elves]] of [[SildÃ«yuir]].{{cite book/Stardeep|6_7|1}}
document_data.Organization: The leader of all the knights in [[Stardeep]] was Commander [[Brathtar]] until {{yearlink|1375}}; the Commander answered only to the [[Keepers of the Cerulean Sign]], specifically, to the one in the Outer Bastion.
document_data.Activities: Empyrean knights defended Stardeep, followed the orders of the Keepers, and worked on training the next generations of Keepers.
document_data.Base of Operations: The Empyrean Knights had a number of facilities in the Outer Bastion of Stardeep.{{cite book/Stardeep|210-214|19}}
